name: zero steps for one
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "zero steps for one" do
    expected = Some 0
    actual = steps 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: divide if even
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "divide if even" do
    expected = Some 4
    actual = steps 16
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: even and odd steps
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "even and odd steps" do
    expected = Some 9
    actual = steps 12
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: large number of even and odd steps
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "large number of even and odd steps" do
    expected = Some 152
    actual = steps 1000000
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: zero is an error
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "zero is an error" do
    expected = None
    actual = steps 0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
